body: Wow, MGQ that is actually lovey-dovey and nice; and not mean, exploitative, abusive, and does not end in snuff? The stars must have aligned for this series of doujins to come to fruition.
Affection 99.999 how isnt she fat from all the food that required lol
Recently saw something about a MGQ OVA episode that came out, then.. i stumbled on this Gem.
And this is the second time it's posted.  Any bets on how many more times?  Average is 5-6 in at least three different languages.
